item.title: GPG: how to generate a key to sign commits with Git
item.description: This post details how to generate a GPG key to sign commits with Git Table of contents Generate a new GPG key Add a GPG key to Github Configure Git to use your GPG key Generate a new GPG key Generate a GPG key pair an enter user ID information. gpg --full-generate-key List GPG keys. gpg --list-secret-keys --keyid-format=long gpg: checking the trustdb gpg: marginals needed: 3 completes needed: 1 trust model: pgp gpg: depth: 0 valid: 1 signed: 0 trust: 0-, 0q, 0n, 0m, 0f, 1u /home/denis/.
